dict.string: on alfred_script(q) set ctrl to q as string tell application "Hermes" if ctrl is equal to "like" or ctrl is equal to "good" or ctrl is equal to "+" then thumbs up else if ctrl = "dislike" or ctrl = "bad" or ctrl = "-" then thumbs down else if ctrl = "skip" or ctrl = "next" or ctrl = "~" then next song else if ctrl = "tired" or ctrl = "!" then tired of song else if ctrl = "play" or ctrl=">" then play else if ctrl = "pause" or ctrl = "#" then pause else if ctrl = "playpause" then playpause else if ctrl = "mute" or ctrl = "silence" then mute else if ctrl = "unmute" then unmute else if ctrl = "loud" then full volume else if ctrl = "louder" then raise volume else if ctrl = "softer" or ctrl = "quieter" then lower volume else if ctrl = "show" or ctrl = "activate" then activate end if end tell end alfred_script
